title: Breathless
description: What happens when an ordinary girl meets the man of everyoneâ€™s dreams?Keeping secrets is never easy, especially since Ryan Spalding is on the cover of every magazine and this year's "Hottest Hunk under 30." Good thing Carly Sparks is so out of the loop when it comes to celebrity affairs, or she'd realize she was in one!
author: Becki Brannen
